summary: The half werewolf is  a being that is half werewolf and half some other type of  creature.  Half werewolves are a pretty rare occurrence, though do exist.  The two most common forms of the half werewolf include the half werewolf – half human and the werepire.
descriptionHtml:
[img]http://img03.blogcu.com/v2/images/orj/e/b/r/ebruuygurkaplan/ebruuygurkaplan_132093616986.jpg[/img]

The half werewolf is  a being that is half werewolf and half some other type of  creature.  Half werewolves are a pretty rare occurrence, though do exist.  The two most common forms of the half werewolf include the half werewolf – half human and the werepire.

Known Bugs
Mouth is standing, dont moveable
Some Helmets is bad on head
textures is a little pixelated :\\

Differences-

sneak+10
light armor+10
heavy armor+10

Spells-
Beastform
Night Eye

----------------------------------
Thanks Bethesda Softwork
author: Slayer40
